description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites work in tandem to shape explosions and blasts of energy. When you’re adjacent to your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KOxmSWm5D1jHy8VU]{Cloud Array (Ex)} and attack with a weapon formed with your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LLNp1urkLncOxgsb]{Gear Array (Ex)} that has the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#blast]{Blast} special weapon property, you can spend a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{Nanite Surge (Ex)} to use the area of your cloud array as the area of effect for the blast weapon. The area can’t be larger than the original weapon’s blast area; if it would be, choose a contiguous area of your cloud array that is equal to the original area or smaller.
